home.title: Welcome to Dog Lovers üê∂
home.subtitle: Your ultimate guide to everything about dogs. Discover breeds, learn care tips, and celebrate our furry friends.
home.breedsDesc: Discover 5 popular dog breeds and find your perfect match.
home.careDesc: Learn how to take the best care of your furry companion.

breeds.title: Popular Dog Breeds
breeds.subtitle: Explore some of the most beloved dog breeds around the world.

goldenRetriever.name: Golden Retriever
goldenRetriever.desc: Friendly, intelligent, and devoted. Golden Retrievers are popular family dogs known for their gentle nature.

germanShepherd.name: German Shepherd
germanShepherd.desc: Confident, courageous, and smart. German Shepherds are versatile working dogs and loyal guardians.

labrador.name: Labrador Retriever
labrador.desc: Outgoing, even-tempered, and gentle. Labs are friendly companions and great with families.

bulldog.name: Bulldog
bulldog.desc: Calm, courageous, and friendly. Bulldogs are known for their distinct appearance and loose skin.

beagle.name: Beagle
beagle.desc: Curious, friendly, and merry. Beagles are scent hounds with a great sense of smell and tracking instinct.

care.title: Dog Care Guide
care.subtitle: Essential tips to keep your furry friend healthy, happy, and thriving.

nutrition.title: Nutrition & Feeding
nutrition.desc: Provide a balanced diet suitable for your dog's age, size, and activity level. Always ensure fresh water is available.

exercise.title: Regular Exercise
exercise.desc: Dogs need daily physical activity to stay healthy and happy. Walking, playing fetch, or running are great options.

grooming.title: Grooming
grooming.desc: Regular brushing, bathing, and nail trimming keep your dog looking good and feeling comfortable.

checkups.title: Health Checkups
checkups.desc: Visit the vet regularly for vaccinations and checkups. Early detection of issues is key to a long life.

love.title: Love & Patience
love.desc: Above all, dogs need love, attention, and patience. Building a strong bond with your dog is the most rewarding part of being a pet parent.
